wijitha herath mema prakashaya karanne demala dayas porawata bawada ohu pawasanawa."sinhala minisun marga nithi kadakalama athaharinawa.muslin minisun marga nithi kadakalama wadadenawa" yanuwen wijith herath shri lanka polisiya pilibandawa karana lada ema prakashaya sampurnayen asathyayak bawath boho welawata siduwanne ema karanaye anith paththa bawath wimal wirawansha pawasanawa.pasugiya aanduwa samaye atham muslin pradeshawala janathawa helmat nomathiwa yathuru padiwala giya aakarayada amathyawaraya mehidi mathak kala mita amatharawa hitapu amathya rishad badurdin ta elaben aanduwaka kisidu idak nolabena bawada wimal wirawansha pawasanawa.me sambandhayen amathyawaraya kala prakasha pahathin.
